name: Impact of coronavirus pandemic on R&D expenditures, by company size: 2020
description: Impact of coronavirus pandemic on R&D expenditures, by company size: 2020

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_increased_in_house_r_d_expenditures
variableMeasured.description: Increased In House R D Expenditures

variableMeasured.name: field_decreased_in_house_r_d_expenditures
variableMeasured.description: Decreased In House R D Expenditures

variableMeasured.name: field_no_change_in_in_house_r_d_expenditures
variableMeasured.description: No Change In In House R D Expenditures

notes: Detail across rows may not add to total because of rounding. Detail across columns have been adjusted to add to total. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that reported R&D.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, 2021 Annual Business Survey: Data Year 2020.
